body_html:
We don't officially support iOS. We have community supported examples that allow TensorFlow to be used on iOS in CPU mode. Our GPU support is achieved on both Linux and OS X using CUDA. So it seems unlikely that we would integrate with the Metal API. @wicke might have thoughts on this.

See also: #491

body:
We don't officially support iOS. We have community supported examples that allow TensorFlow to be used on iOS in CPU mode. Our GPU support is achieved on both Linux and OS X using CUDA. So it seems unlikely that we would integrate with the Metal API. @wicke might have thoughts on this.

See also: #491
